channel.title: 508 help clan chat

item.title: 508 help clan chat
item.dc:creator: @needhoster needhoster
item.description:
@needhoster wrote:

okay, i added clan chat but say you say “join my clan chat”. then you say “/hi”, it says in normal chat “join my clan chat” and in the clan chat, it says “hi”. I need help changing that. i think it has to do with this:

[code] public void handlePacket(Player p, int packetId, int packetSize) {
if (p == null || p.stream == null) {
return;
}
int chatTextEffects = p.stream.readUnsignedWord();
int numChars = p.stream.readUnsignedByte();
String chatText = Misc.decryptPlayerChat(p.stream, numChars);
if (chatText.startsWith("/")) {
if (p.clanRoom.length() > 0) {
Engine.clanChat.sendMessage(p, chatText.substring(1));
}
} else {

            p.chatTextEffects = chatTextEffects;
            p.chatText = chatText;
            p.chatTextUpdateReq = true;
            p.updateReq = true;
    }
}[/code] HELP PLEASE

Read full topic
